title: Project setup & environment
description: Create venv, pin dependencies, add README and sample data folder. Verify PyTorch + MPS (if Apple Silicon).

title: Frame extraction proof-of-concept
description: Implement a small script that reads a video, extracts frames at 1 fps (configurable), saves thumbnails to disk.

title: Person detection POC
description: Run YOLOv8 on extracted frames, confirm person boxes and board detections; save crops and debug images.

title: Tracking inside videos
description: Integrate DeepSort/StrongSORT to produce per-video tracks (track id + frame range + average bbox).

title: Embedding extraction (re-id)
description: Extract person re-id embeddings (OSNet) for each track, average per-track embeddings and store them.

title: Surfboard descriptor (optional MVP boost)
description: Crop probable surfboard regions, compute color histograms and a small CNN embedding; store with track data.

title: Cross-video clustering
description: Cluster track-level embeddings across videos (DBSCAN/Agglomerative) and produce candidate groups with confidence scores.

title: Simple review UI (Streamlit)
description: Create a Streamlit app to show clusters, thumbnails, allow accept/merge/split and export groups as folders/symlinks.

title: End-to-end run and test
description: Run the full pipeline on a sample SD folder, measure runtime, adjust sampling and thresholds.

title: Polish & packaging (optional)
description: Wrap prototype into a simple macOS bundle (pyinstaller / py2app or package backend + Tauri UI).
